sentence.Network_en: He stormed out of the apartment, slamming the door furiously behind him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他怒不可遏地把门猛地一摔，冲出了公寓。

sentence.Network_en: Officials worked furiously to repair the centre court.
sentence.Network_cn: 官员们全力以赴地整修中心球场。

sentence.Network_en: He lit a cigarette and puffed at it furiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 他点燃了一支香烟,狂吸了几口.

the couple was quarreling furiously about whose turn it was to cook the dinner ., 这对夫妇对该轮到谁做晚饭而激烈争吵着.
He pounded the drum furiously ., 他猛打鼓.

furiously是什么意思... ... furiously angry ： 大发雷霆 curse furiously ： 怒冲冲地骂 curse furiously ： 大骂.

entry.def: Someone who is furious is extremely angry.

example.ex: He is furious at the way his wife has been treated...
example.tran: 妻子受到的待遇让他感到异常愤怒。

example.ex: I am furious that it has taken so long to uncover what really happened.
example.tran: 花了这么长的时间才弄清楚究竟发生了什么事，这让我怒向胆边生。

entry.def: Furious is also used to describe something that is done with great energy, effort, speed, or violence.

example.tran: 一场激烈的枪战随之爆发。

means.word_mean: 1. (of the elements) in a wild and stormy manner;
2. in a manner marked by extreme or violent energy;

sentences.sentence: "she went peddling furiously up the narrow street"

means.word_mean: 3. in an impassioned or very angry manner;

auth_sentence.content: Hartshorne had worked furiously to try to stem the bleeding.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hartshorne had worked furiously to try to stem the bleeding.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hartshorne had worked furiously to try to stem the bleeding.

auth_sentence.content: See her furiously wrestle off imaginary chains!
auth_sentence.res_content: See her furiously wrestle off imaginary chains!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: See her furiously wrestle off imaginary chains!

auth_sentence.content: It is now snowing and storming furiously.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is now snowing and storming furiously.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is now snowing and storming furiously.

Sentence.sentence: Einstein would furiously play his violin as a way to think through a knotty physics problem.

sentences.en: He blushed furiously and Robyn knew she had hit the mark.
sentences.cn: 他气得满脸通红,罗宾知道自己达到了目的。

sentences.en: “Who are you?” the man exclaimed furiously.
He pedalled furiously up the hill.
sentences.cn: 他猛踩踏板向山上骑去。

sentences.en: He was sitting at his desk typing furiously.
sentences.cn: 他坐在桌前疯狂地打着字。

sentences.en: He lit a cigarette and puffed at it furiously.
sentences.cn: 他点燃了一支香烟,狂吸了几口。

sentences.en: An army of buyers haggles furiously with an army of salesmen.
sentences.cn: 一大群买主在和卖主拼命地讨价还价。
